name: Core_Assets_ImageOperations_MirrorVertical
description: An image operation. Mirrors the image vertically.
Let \(w \geq 0\) and \(h \geq 0\) be the width of the height of the image, respectively,
then the pixel at \((x,y)\) with \(x \in [1,w]\) and \(y \in [1,h]\) is swapped with the pixel at \((x,h-y)\).
